name: Understanding Programming
prompt_image: A highly detailed digital artwork representing the concept of Understanding Programming. A translucent, intricate brain is superimposed over a modern circuit board, with glowing neural pathways mirroring the golden traces on the board. Binary code (1s and 0s) and elegant snippets of Python-like syntax flow like a gentle river through both structures. Simple, clean geometric shapes—cubes, spheres, pyramids—materialize from this flow of data, assembling into a stable structure. The scene is illuminated by a soft, ethereal blue and amber light, suggesting clarity and intelligence. The style is sleek, futuristic, and conceptual, with a focus on depth, light, and symbolic connection. No text, letters, or words are visible in the image.
subtitulo: Do zero absoluto à maestria na lógica de construção de sistemas
